title: Nathan Adams发布了自己不参加Minecon的原因
author: chyx
txt_content:
本帖最后由 chyx 于 2016-8-31 01:29 编辑 

连接：https://twitter.com/Dinnerbone/status/768464749533114368

Lots of people asking why I won't be going to Minecon. It's because I'll be too busy learning how to use these!
许多人问我为何不去Minecon。原因是我忙着学习如何使用它们。

replies.author: 星E君
replies.txt_content:
